website_summaries.verdict: Amazing value for the money, and compact enough for travel. Features a fast 30-second heat up time and 20 temperature settings.
pros: We love the convenient tangle-free swivel cord
The 1-inch ceramic plate can heat up to max 450 degrees Fahrenheit max, with 20 lower temperature settings before that
Features a useful closing lock and auto switch-off for added safety
cons: Some users find the ceramic can disintegrate after not many uses

customer_reviews.title: Best Fiat Iron EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received a white one as a gift that lasted me 3 years (it was used, but still good) until it wouldn't heat up anymore. This fiat iron is the best for thick hair!! I even noticed that after washing my hair some parts of it would still stay straight! I recommend this for any woman of color to get! It's the best!! 😁😁😁
customer_reviews.author: Latasha Bowman

customer_reviews.title: I love this! 7 years strong
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this straightener. I bought mine back in 2012 and still have it, use it at least once a week or more when I’m more social. Anyone who borrows it loves it as well and I honestly can’t believe it’s lasted me this long. I’m ordering my second one now that this one has started to get just a little loose and doesn’t clamp evenly when I’m curling my hair, but that only started a month ago. Amazing price for a great quality. In fact I think I bought it for $20 before haha. Super recommend this straightener!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Broke after few uses
customer_reviews.text: I literally have only used this straightener a few times since buying a little over a month ago and it no longer works. It doesn’t even cut on. W
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 100 stars if I could
customer_reviews.text: I bought the straightener because I had this exact one for seven years before the wire accidentally got cut! I lived without it for about three years and finally decided that I couldn't live without it anymore, the funny thing is though at target and Walmart they are $40-$50, of course I trust Amazon with my heart and ordered it here for 15.99. This product is amazing and it works as well as a Chi. It doesn't pull your hair and it's so smooth and heats up fast! I also have always loved the auto shut off because I'm a ditz and Forget too often to turn it off! If I could give it 100 stars i would!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Ritschard

customer_reviews.title: Lasted over a decade!
customer_reviews.text: This straightener lasted me from, no lie, middle school through now. Purchased sometime around 08/09. Just bought a new one and I'm sure it will last just as long. The only thing wrong with the old one is that after years of being dropped, the screw and spring inside that holds both pieces together became really loose and I didn't want to accidentally burn myself if it came loose while straightening my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great- love this product
customer_reviews.text: One of my all time favorite hair straighteners. I own two because they work so well. I have one in my gym bag and one in home . These things really straighten and the heat is really well but doesn't fry your hair.. super product
customer_reviews.author: stacey zinck

customer_reviews.title: I was tricked
customer_reviews.text: Was under the impression I could set it at 450degress but the button goes up to 20 only, and it’s not 450. I will be giving these away and going the fhi website. Thanks but no thanks
customer_reviews.author: alesha clayton

customer_reviews.title: Did not work the same
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because my old ones broke, however these didn't get hot at all. End up going to the store to purchase a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: bobbie young

customer_reviews.title: Ceramic plates made to far apart
customer_reviews.text: The ceramic plates were not close enough. It barely touch my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are fabulous my 11-year-old granddaughter hates I mean hates to get her hair done! these made her hair so easy to comb!!!!
customer_reviews.author: dixie

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: This iron is wonderful. It heated very quickly, the temp stayed very consistent & the straightening power from root to end was very impressive. I've never owned a hair straightener that I could just glide across my hair in just one stroke. I ordered the 1.5 in & will be ordering the 1 in as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get to
customer_reviews.text: Not as hot as I expected from this brand ,I was a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: shoked

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Straightener does a great job! I was worried because my old Andis straightener finally died after almost 10 years of use and I thought I would never love another straightener as much but this iron is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Amazon refused to refund
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these for years and it finally give out. I got my first one from my salon. I bought my second one from Amazon. It was delivered September 27, 2019. Last week while holding it close to my head it sparked, made a very loud popping noise and then kicked the breaker in my bathroom. Amazon refused to refund my money.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: 16 months later, I still love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine in September of 2010. I am still totally in love with it! One of the best values of anything I've ever bought. I've not had any issues with the plates flaking or the sides getting too hot. The only time I've ever burned myself on it was when I accidentally grabbed the open iron by the plates. OW! But yeah, it's great. I have a thick head of super-soft, fine hair and it straightens it with ease. It takes me literally 5 minutes to do all of my (shoulder-length) hair.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The last one I bought of this brand lasted over 5 years!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Villar

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: this is the second time I’ve bought this brand’s straightener. I had the last one for literally 10 years. this one is just as great as the last one was, and I assume it’ll last just as long! also, I love the fact that it automatically turns off fairly quickly, too, because I leave it plugged in/on too often.
customer_reviews.author: The Mauve Avenger

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after the 3rd try.
customer_reviews.text: I just pulled out this flat iron for the 4th time and it won’t heat up to the full temperature. Half my hair is straight because it just won’t heat up. I’ve used Andis irons for years and I’ve never had one not work and I use it less than I ever have before. I’m very unhappy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: NVK

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I used to use my boyfriends mom’s straightener like this, but when we moved out, I decided to get my own. I am very happy with this purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mya

customer_reviews.title: Love this flatiron
customer_reviews.text: Love this flat iron, it gets my roots well and has not damaged my hair due to the multiple heat settings I can choose from
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: Wire broke real quick .....
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been an Andis fan but this time around I barely used this flat iron and it already broke - the wire came right out from the bottom of the flat iron. I haven’t been wrapping the wire, I haven’t traveled with this one, and I barely use it. How did the wire just come right out ??? Was not happy....
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: I have fine hair and this flattening iron worked great
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair and this flattening iron worked great. My daughter borrowed it and loved it so much that I bought her one too. I have had mine for a white and have not had any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Beach

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: So this iron heats up very fast. Works great for straight AND curls (If you know how to curl hair with a straightener). Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: tia

customer_reviews.title: I have had my other one for like 6+ years
customer_reviews.text: Just got it yesterday, it came fast! I have had my other one for like 6+ years....and it still works great but the metal plates were really covered and I couldn't get them clean. I am hoping this one works just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing working Andis hair straighter that straightens dry or dampened hair!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely Love this Andis hair straighter! This is my second owned hair straighter by far this Andis straighter is the best! So far so good amazing temperature control lock feature & warmth! What i like about it the most is the 5 year warranty!Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Starr Lane

customer_reviews.title: Broken product
customer_reviews.text: This Product does not work. I hag purchased them for my daughter to take to college and she just opened them too late to return them ugghhh
customer_reviews.author: emma johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love andis....
customer_reviews.text: Love this straightner.. this is the 3rd one I have purchased over the years.. love it..
customer_reviews.author: Amy Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Good straightener
customer_reviews.text: Just a normal hair straightener. Good quality and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Shearer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: I was so tempted to buy one of those $100+ hair irons. But thanks to the reviews on Amazon, I bought this one. I think this is one of the best value for money items that I have ever bought. The iron is smooth and heats up very fast. I usually keep it at about 10, sometimes between 10 and 15 and it does a good job of straightening my wavy hair. Add a little thermal protection cream and I am all set for 2-3 days without reusing it.
customer_reviews.author: arbitary

customer_reviews.title: its ok, not great!
customer_reviews.text: i wouldnt be so crazy about this item , its just ok, kind of cheap, so you are getting what you paid, it doesnt go smooth on hair, but it does make them straight, the reason why i got this one i had expensive ones before, they work nicer but they didnt last me a year,they broke..so i decided why would i pay so much if still it doesnt last. but the difference in cheap model and expensive one is pretty big, so if you use them a lot just get more expensive model, this one is still maid pretty cheap. and have it on very low setting its getting hot fast!!!
customer_reviews.author: tohican

customer_reviews.title: This is a good one.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this exact same flat iron several times over the past 13 years. I'm happy I found it here. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: N.C.C.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a great flat iron for a great price... get this one! The last one of these exact flat irons that I purchased was in 2009 and it is still going strong. I only purchased a new one for when the day comes that it goes out on me. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: AnsleyCotton

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love this model better than my high priced ones I’ve had in the past. This one does a much better job in half the time
customer_reviews.author: Notcurly

customer_reviews.title: Leaves crimps while curling
customer_reviews.text: I had this same model for about 5 years and I'd loved it. The price of this newer version is great, but defintely leaves crimps when curling your hair. I always curl my hair with straightner so I know what I'm doing but this unit just doesn't quite make the cut.. Time to purchase the Chi Elite afterall.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: It worked perfectly at first. I used it maybe ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfectly at first. I used it maybe once a week for a month or two and now it barely gets hot and does not work as well as when first purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good value
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Just be mindful of the temperature. Should test it prior to using because it does get really hot. Other than that I definitely suggest buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Janice H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome flat iron!
customer_reviews.text: This iron is so awesome! I can get my thick AA hair strait and I can curl it with the iron if I want. I paid 90 plus dollars for a sedu and solia. They did not even get my relaxed hair strait even on their highest settings. I can straiten my hair with the andis flat iron on the low setting and avoid heat damage. I love it because it gave me the best value for my dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Darcey Y. Derosa

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Best straightener ever!! I’ve had two of these. Both lasted 6-7 years. Works well for curling hair too!
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comes in original packaging. No damage. Only flat iron I use that straightens my hair!!!
customer_reviews.author: tamara kendrick

customer_reviews.title: For the price ($16) its great
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is supposed to do. Gets VERY VERY hot, so I'm glad there is a dial temperature setting. I find that my hair snags a bit where the plate meets the plastic, at the very end bit of hair. The ceramic plates are not salon quality but for the price, its a really good deal. Better than the ones you'll find in a drugstore in the $20-30 range.
customer_reviews.author: Liamsmama

customer_reviews.title: Best Flat Iron Around!
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair and I feel this straightener does a better job styling my hair than anything else I've tried. I have purchased more expensive irons (Chi) and nothing beats the "clamp feel" I get when I use my Andis.
customer_reviews.author: maebe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product !!!!
customer_reviews.text: THANK YOU EVERYONE for the great reviews, it made me buy this product. I'm so happy I did! I had an expensive Maxiglide and the plug broke and I didn't want to spend $100 for another. No need! This product gets very hot and works amazing. Its so lightweight and heats up in seconds. I'm very happy and you will probably be too.
customer_reviews.author: psulion333

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic :)
customer_reviews.text: I love this flat iron! I used it nearly every day and its lasted sooo long. It heats up really fast and does an excellent job. After about a year, the gold on the plating begins to fade and come off though. Its lasted longer than ANY flat it\ron Ive had before wich is nice. Its now been like 2 years and it makes a buzzing noise when I plug it in now. but still I recomend this :)
customer_reviews.author: Schoolkid15

customer_reviews.title: Great Iron
customer_reviews.text: This iron is incredible. I tried it on my hair which is chemically treated and my daughter's whose hair is extremely dry africn type hair and chemically treated. It was wonderful. The shine was great and the frizz was gone. Even my five year old's natural african hair got straight and silky. A must buy. I'm going to get another for my sister who's a hairdresser.
customer_reviews.author: TriniK

customer_reviews.title: Convenient features and works well.
customer_reviews.text: This flat iron heats up quickly, has auto shut off in case you forget, and the lock feature keeps it compact in a suitcase or backpack. It’s “just right,” as Goldilocks would say!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Andis 1 inch ceramic clamp flat iron
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she loves it because it doesn't pull her hair. Her hair is very long so it was hard to find one that didn't pull her hair everytime she used it. I would recommend this to family and friends. very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Scott

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this flat iron. It is the best. The ones I've had before were from Revlon, and those cannot compare to this product. At a low setting with this product, I was able to straighten my hair. (I have straight or wavy hair, depending on how I sleep the night before, thin and dark brown, long-length). However, with my sister's hair, her's is very thick and wavy and medium length. I straightened it and it was perfect. Next day, it wasn't as wavy anymore, which we were both very surprised about. I would totally recommend this product :)
customer_reviews.author: MDX

customer_reviews.title: Don’t make them like they used to....
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in Jan, heating element went out in may... -.-
customer_reviews.author: Angie L.

customer_reviews.title: Died quickly, and easy to burn fingers
customer_reviews.text: I liked this item for a couple of months, but I did notice it was far too easy to burn my fingers on the sides. I wouldn't set it down on anything because it definitely would have started a fire. Then one day it stopped heating up completely even though the light goes on. It has like a year warrantee, but when I contacted the company I got absolutely no response. I tried used two other flat irons since, and they work just as well without having burn-your-hands sides. I really liked that this one turned itself off, but I just bought a separate socket with a timer and I plug my current on into that. Works fine.
customer_reviews.author: L8rGator

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Flat Iron
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine and thin hair and it takes me 5 min to flat iron it all, and it does not pull out any of my hair. My daughter has super thick and curly hair to her bra strap area and it took me 15 minutes to flat iron it all. I have only used it for 1 week, but I have used it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Graham

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase Ever!
customer_reviews.text: My hair is not hard to straighten at all but this flat iron is awesome. Maybe I had a crappy one before but it would take me about 5 to 10 minutes to straighten my short already fairly straight hair. With this iron I was done in less than 60 seconds. I'm so glad I finally replaced my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy cuz cheap made
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever used it and today the on/off button loosen up and disfunction not hot or it on off as I use it cuz it’s broken. Wish I bought at store at least I could return
customer_reviews.author: Greg Dawson

customer_reviews.title: great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: i'm new to the world of flat irons so I figured I should start with a highly-rated, inexpensive one. My hair is primarily straight but I have a lot of it. I've been blow drying it for years but I wanted to try getting it really straight. After reading a lot of reviews, I opted for the Andis 1" ceramic flat iron. It's easy to use and I like the results. My only concern is the added time it takes to 1st blow dry, then flat iron my hair and the potential damage to my hair. While I don't think I'll use a flat iron every time I wash my hair, I will use it for special occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Sholden7

customer_reviews.title: Great. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: For this price it works great. I do not see a difference between this one and the more expensive one I own!
customer_reviews.author: Justina

customer_reviews.title: Good for the value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great flat iron for the price. It does start to wear out after a year or so, with daily use. This is my second one. But, it's much less expensive than most, so probably worth it (especially if you aren't committed to a hairstyle forever).
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Ceramic coming off
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty wavy hair and this straighter was bought to replace my titanium one that I had for 3 years. I bought it about a year ago but never really used it regularly until about 5 months ago. I use it 3-5 days a week and now the ceramic on the plates is starting to come off. If you have wavy hair or any natural curl in your hair it doesn't do a good job. I would not buy this again and not suggest it unless you have fine hair that you just need to work a few waves out of.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L Kerstetter

customer_reviews.title: Hey there hottie
customer_reviews.text: Great price and really good curling iron I really like this one and I'm very picky
customer_reviews.author: Southernpeach

customer_reviews.title: Steal for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can't beat this straightener. I bought one at Walmart years ago when my nice one died and I was in a pinch. Best purchase ever. Now, 5+ years later and I replaced it with the same model because I loved it so much. Just as a note, I have fine, wavy/curly hair. Straightens super fast for me. Heats up quickly too.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn W

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I got this straightener last week. After using it a few days I've decided to return it. It does not keep its heat consistently and I have to wait after straightening a section to let it heat up again. Not only that it seems to fry my hair noticeably. I didn't have that problem with my previous ceramic straightener. I've decided to replace this one with thestraightener as it had many excellent reviews. I don't usually review products but I wanted to give my experience with this iron for those looking for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: S. Michele

customer_reviews.title: Replace the same one I have had for 10 years ...
customer_reviews.text: Replace the same one I have had for 10 years which was exactly the same product worth the money heats up quickly would always buy this product
customer_reviews.author: Pamela G.

customer_reviews.title: flat iron
customer_reviews.text: This is a good small flat iron. It heats up well and I was able to straighten my frizz well - however to make curls with it, it doesn't work as well. Still good - just not excellent. You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Mandaruz

customer_reviews.title: ... cheap kinda sticks closed and the plastic is just bad
customer_reviews.text: Was cheap and when I tried to use it I can tell it's cheap kinda sticks closed and the plastic is just bad
customer_reviews.author: m.van38

customer_reviews.title: Great product and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great product. It heats up quickly and does it's job well, whether you want to straighten or curl. I have ample amounts of very fine, straight hair, so I use the iron mostly for curling. It does a fantastic job at curling, way better than any actual curling iron I've used. The curls stay in all day without falling out, as they do with a normal curling iron. I considered buying a more expensive flat iron, but I only only intended to use it about once a week so this product is a fantastic value. With my limited amount of use I will have it for a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Fell in love with this flat iron the first time I used it. Heats up quickly hold tightly when you close it. would purchase more products from Andis. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: missygg

customer_reviews.title: ... iron of the same brand and I'm just as pleased with this flat iron as I was with the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement of a flat iron of the same brand and I'm just as pleased with this flat iron as I was with the one I had before. It's great!!
customer_reviews.author: Ebony Cook

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and I use it for my hair
customer_reviews.author: Tyongie Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Love this flat iron!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this flat iron for over a year now. Still works great with results as good as the salon brand flat iron I owned before, but has lasted twice as long! Love the ability to control the amount of heat, although it does not include a temperature gauge. I also love the locking mechanism in the handle - makes it easy to keep it closed in my suit case when I'm traveling. Heats up quick and easy to clean. No regrets with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: J. Beach

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great flat iron. Does not burn the hair. Easily moves through the hair as it straightens.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Farris

customer_reviews.title: temperature control ok!
customer_reviews.text: I have a kinky hair which the temp could of been higher , but it's aight
customer_reviews.author: BINOU

customer_reviews.title: ... iron for over 3 years and it's still working great! It heats up quick and I haven't had ...
customer_reviews.text: I've now had this flat iron for over 3 years and it's still working great! It heats up quick and I haven't had any issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Stuhlmiller

customer_reviews.title: She says it works better than any she's had
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves her new flat iron! She says it works better than any she's had!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Had it since Dec. 2010. No complaints. It's a good hair straightener. It automatically shuts itself off after a while, I learned that after leaving the house forgetting it was on!!!
customer_reviews.author: Roze

customer_reviews.title: ANdis 1 inch
customer_reviews.text: This product is really good for the price it is sold for. I had never bought straigner this cheap before and i must say it will work for me for a wile. I liked how it heated up really quick and how fast i was able to do my hair. I have very volumemized wavy beach hair and it surprice me how i didnt need to go over my hair so many times.. In some parts i only needed to go thru it once and in some other parts i went over my hair twice. i would reccoment this product if you dont have the money to spend alot.
customer_reviews.author: BeRnY

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it sometimes snags my hair :(
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Great Flat Iron
customer_reviews.text: I love Andis hair care products. The do not disappoint. I have their dryer as well. Its great too. Keep up the good work Andis.
customer_reviews.author: Desdemona

customer_reviews.title: I Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This Flat Iron is amazing! I can straighten my hair in less than half the time it took me with my old flat iron, and it is so much more compact and easy to carry along or pack in a suitcase. I used to carry my flat iron with me for touch ups between work and going out, or in case it got humid. I don't even need to take this one with! My hair stays smooth and straight all day! There was even a day last week that it rained and I thought I was in trouble but it stayed straight! I Love it!
customer_reviews.author: SarbearAnn

customer_reviews.title: No scorched hair
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this item 3 times because when they stop working for various reasons such as European voltage problems, age, loss. I find this to be a good iron, I have others I don't like as much.
customer_reviews.author: cds

customer_reviews.title: DIDNT TURN ON!
customer_reviews.text: My flat iron came broken. It wouldnt turn on at all. Never got to use it
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I cut my hair and since then, I've only used this, it's a lot easier to use then the larger one I had previously used.
customer_reviews.author: Syrena_P

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This hair straightener is so much better than other Chi straighteners I've used. For this price, you really can't beat it. I love my Andis hair straightener.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: oh yea she plays no games lol U MUST USE!!
customer_reviews.text: My hair was luxurious tight curls and I was getting a little tierd of the same hair style so I bought this flat iron and some very good conditioner and shampoo (mix chicks) after I use the shampoo I left the conditioner in for 15mins then rise and dry for a min then went to straighting my hair let me tell you she laid my hair playing no games !!(silky,soft,long,straight) I left the house looking like a super model literally. Everyone was looking at me every where I went
customer_reviews.author: monloe

customer_reviews.title: ... I am an African American and this is the best flat iron I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I have really curly hair and I am an African American and this is the best flat iron I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Bazyomo

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Even better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I have always relied on flatirons in the $20 range, and this time around I decided to try something new (usually I use the Ceramic Tools flatiron, which isn't bad but is flimsy and cracks easily) so I bought this one and I am really surprised at how good quality it is! It's sturdy, heats up really fast, and does a super job on my hair. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: hannibal the cannibal

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair straightening iron. It works very well and it is very portable and easy to use. Would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I was totally skeptical about this item, but I figured if it didn't work I wasn't out that much. Completely surprised me. This iron definitely works as good, if not better, than other more expensive flat irons I've purchased. I've only had it for a couple of weeks, so I'm still waiting to see how long it lasts, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: mfrazier

customer_reviews.title: The size is perfect for every day use and doesn't take too much ...
customer_reviews.text: It does it's job to straighten hair. I can even curl my hair with this! The size is perfect for every day use and doesn't take too much space on the table and even to bring when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Great price, nice product. It does what it's supposed to and the finish on this product is good. It isn't too heavy or unwieldy and the handle doesn't get too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn H. Jasperson

customer_reviews.title: Flat Iron
customer_reviews.text: Love it, just wish I'd have bought the 2". Works much better then the conair product that I previously had. No groove to snag and pull your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to replace the one my daughter took to college. I'm picky about my flatiron and is very pleased with this product. I would certainly recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: pure awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: I personally don't have it yet because it hasn't arrived to my house but my cousin got it for Christmas and she let me use it on a rainy day that my hair was unruly and OMG!!! i fell in love and more when she told me the price i was like i got to have it!!!! like i only did my hair right after went outside in a rainy day and i didn't have to touch my hair at all the next day till i washed it. Definitely a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: dally79

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This flat iron works perfectly! Why pay up to 5 or 6 times more for another make that would be basically the same quality?
customer_reviews.author: John Rokas

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new flat iron, looked into getting a chi. This looked like a good option, and it was so much less expensive. It works great. I don't even need to turn it very high for great results. I am very pleased! I have shoulder length fine hair, it works great. I was especially pleased with how well it worked on my bangs. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this flat iron for my teenage daughter because she loves to use my more expensive flat iron. I didn't want her hair ruined so I read the many reviews for this product and decided to give it a try. It outperforms my flat iron and her hair looks great! She loves it! Great product, very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: mamarox

customer_reviews.title: i wish i never bought this flat iron
customer_reviews.text: A few years back i got an andis ultra flat iron and it made my thick,curly hair pin straight so i thought buying this flat iron that i would get the same results, i was mistaken cause once u turn it on for a few minutes it heats up then shuts off when it gets too hot i did my hair with it and got frizzy,puffy results, very unhappy with it
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most the other reviewers I am giving this only one star because the product died a little over month since I purchased it. It sucked!
customer_reviews.author: Anu

customer_reviews.title: By Far best straightener
customer_reviews.text: I've used a lot of straighteners this is the best. And so inexpensive. I was in shock at how great it was. I can't believe I ever spent over 20 bucks on a straightener when this is out there. I Love the curls too. This is going to get a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Andis straightener, and it's not as durable as my first one.
customer_reviews.author: ju ju

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this straightener! One of the best I've used and it was only $15. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Works and great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this flat iron for a few months now and I couldn't be happier. I paid a great price and it does the job wonderfully. It heats up fast and that is a plus. I also like how you can lock the iron together for easy travel.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Schneider

customer_reviews.title: hair came out shiny and str8!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good my hair has gotten for the 1st time ever!! LOVE LOVE LOVE it!! Fast service got exactly what I was promised.
customer_reviews.author: verontz

product_meta.title: Andis 67095 High Heat Ceramic Hair Flat Iron, 1-Inch, High Heat 450ºF, Black
product_meta.description: Color:Black/Gold| Size:1 InchAndis High Heat Ceramic Hair Flattening Iron, Black (67095)
feature_bullets: Heats to 375 degrees with 20 different heat settings
Clamp style holds hair tight for quick results
Great for straightening thick or fine hair
Ceramic plates preserve moisture, creating incredible luster and shine

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
